statements: SELECT * FROM product_catalog WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_catalog WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, description FROM product_catalog WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM product_catalog WHERE description LIKE '%electronics%';
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM product_catalog GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM product_catalog WHERE supplier_id = 1 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_catalog WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_id, description FROM product_catalog WHERE description LIKE '%premium%' ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM product_catalog GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING avg_price > 50;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM product_catalog;
SELECT * FROM SupplierProducts;
SELECT product_name, price FROM SupplierProducts ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM Suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, price FROM SupplierProducts WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM SupplierProducts WHERE price > 50.00
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT product_name, price, supplier_name FROM SupplierProducts JOIN Suppliers ON SupplierProducts.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id WHERE Suppliers.location = 'New York'

SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM Suppliers JOIN SupplierProducts ON Suppliers.supplier_id = SupplierProducts.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 3 ORDER BY total_products DESC

SELECT product_name, supplier_name, price FROM SupplierProducts JOIN Suppliers ON SupplierProducts.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id WHERE supplier_name IN ('Supplier A', 'Supplier B', 'Supplier C')
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Suppliers;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name FROM Products JOIN Suppliers ON Products.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT category_name FROM Categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_location='USA';
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, s.supplier_name FROM Products p JOIN Suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM Categories ORDER BY category_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Suppliers JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price >= 100 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT product_name, category_name FROM Products JOIN ProductCategories ON Products.product_id = ProductCategories.product_id JOIN Categories ON ProductCategories.category_id = Categories.category_id WHERE Categories.category_name = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price, description FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_phone FROM suppliers WHERE contact_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 3
SELECT p.product_name, s.supplier_name FROM products p JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id
SELECT p.product_name, c.category_name FROM products p JOIN product_categories pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.category_id
SELECT DISTINCT s.supplier_name, p.product_name FROM suppliers s JOIN supplier_products sp ON s.supplier_id = sp.supplier_id JOIN products p ON sp.product_id = p.product_id
